title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the VR safety training platform. Conduct research and gather input from stakeholders, including construction companies, safety experts, and potential users.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture for the VR safety training platform, including the VR environment, user interface, and backend components.

title: Virtual Reality Environment Development
description: Develop the virtual reality environment for the safety training scenarios, including realistic 3D models, physics simulations, and interactive elements.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend components for the VR safety training platform, including user authentication, data management, and integration with other systems.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, training scenarios, and other relevant information.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for the VR safety training platform, including menus, instructions, and feedback mechanisms.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the VR safety training platform complies with relevant security standards and regulations, including data protection and user privacy.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy for the VR safety training platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline and infrastructure for the VR safety training platform, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials for the VR safety training platform, including user guides, administrator manuals, and training videos.
